comment._content: the title is missing the last letter of his name, Attilio Piccirilli one of 6 sons of a sculpting family, this appears to be at the USS Maine Memorial he designed, unveiled in New York City in 1913, in Columbus Circle en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Attilio_Piccirilli
